recipe_name: Potato salad with cottage cheese dressing
author: Brian Turner
method: Boil the potatoes in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for ten minutes, or until just tender. Drain and place in a bowl. For the dressing, in a small bowl mix together the Greek-style yoghurt, cottage cheese and wholegrain mustard. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, mix the cottage cheese mixture with the potatoes and serve warm.
ingredients: 150g/5Â½oz baby new potatoes,  6 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt,  3 tbsp cottage cheese,  2 tbsp wholegrain mustard,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
